name: TMW Front-end Guidelines
tagline: Guidelines and standards for front-end development at TMW
body:
These guidelines have moved to the TMW Tech blog:

[View our Front-end Development Guidelines](http://tech.tmw.co.uk/code/TMW-frontend-guidelines/).

The markdown in this [repo](https://github.com/tmwagency/TMW-frontend-guidelines) is still maintained an kept up-to-date if you would like to fork it and create your own version.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
